page.title: 01Local History
page.content: { {Yaxley}is reputed to be the largest village in the country.In recent years there has been extensive development but despite its size,{Yaxley}has retained its village atmosphere. Then name {Yaxley}is purely Anglo-saxon.When {Yaxley}first came into existence it overlooked a vast expanse of water known as meres.This has all now been drained and has proved to be the basis of a large farming community. The {Yaxley}coat of arms consists of: Two stags,a cuckoo-{Yaxley }means "Clearing where cuckoos congregate" A shield consiting of a "Y",wheat sheaves and chimneys. There are also two hatchets dating back to Roman times. The Motto-"Unity,Work,Progress". {
